column4: how do i change default/preferred applications for things other than browser, email & terminal?
right-click the file and choose an associated app
yes, it doesnt seem to work. I would like videos to default to mplayer rather than totem, but even when i set them to open with mplayer, they still launch in totem
mneptok in fact i would rather not have totem at all, but apparently i cant remove it?
